abstract: Political Memo; main pitfalls to Hillary Clinton's presidential campaign are posed not by Democratic opponents but by news media that has already tripped up Republican contenders; Clinton has managed to keep reporters at safe distance while maintaining comfortable dominance on campaign trail.
lead_paragraph: The news media is Hillary Rodham Clinton’s only real opponent so far en route to the Democratic nomination, and it makes political sense for her to avoid it.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton, Acutely Aware of Pitfalls, Avoids Press on Campaign Trail
headline.print_headline: Acutely Aware of Pitfalls, Clinton Holds Off Reporters on the Trail

snippet: The news media is Hillary Rodham Clinton’s only real opponent so far en route to the Democratic nomination, and it makes political sense for her to avoid it.
